lead_paragraph: San Francisco 49ers quarterback Colin Kaepernick knelt with his arms folded during the performance of the U.S. national anthem during a pre-season game in San Diego on Thursday, continuing his protest against racial injustice and police brutality.

headline.print_headline: NFL's Kaepernick Kneels During National Anthem, Continuing Protest
headline.main: NFL's Kaepernick Kneels During National Anthem, Continuing Protest

snippet: San Francisco 49ers quarterback Colin Kaepernick knelt with his arms folded during the performance of the U.S. national anthem during a pre-season game in San Diego on Thursday, continuing his protest against racial injustice and police brutality....
